lines.text:
[revving engine at traffic signal]
Oh, wanna race, do they? Well, they ain't gonna get ahead of meeee!
[Mr. Wheeler had bumped into another driver's car]
Hey, you think you own the whole road?
Hmph! Of course I own the road. My taxes pay for them. I voted for road bonds. I pay for the roads and I'll use 'em.

[yelling at passing cars]
Get off my road! Move over! Lemme pass!

[yelling at a tow truck that is towing his now-totaled car away with him in it honking the horn]
Come on! Move over! Get out of the way, roadhog!
drive safely, play fair, give the other fellow a break, and...

[yelling at the narrator]
Aw, shut up!
